data.title: Sophia Palaiologina
data.meta_description: Sophia Fominichna Palaiologina or Paleologue was a Byzantine princess from the Palaiologos imperial dynasty and the grand princess of Moscow as the second wife of Ivan III of Russia. Her father was Thomas Palaiologos, the despot of the Morea. Through her eldest son, Vasili III, she was the grandmother of Ivan IV, the first crowned tsar of all Russia.
data.text:
Grand Princess of Moscow from 1472 to 1503 / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
